mapper.select: SELECT id, created, title FROM (SELECT A.id, A.created, A.title, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.created DESC) AS NUM FROM DATA_FUNDS A WHERE SUBSTR (A.PATH,1,5) = CASE #{lang} WHEN 'vi_VN' THEN 'vi-VN' WHEN 'en_US' THEN 'en-US' WHEN 'kr_KR' THEN 'kr-KR' ELSE 'vi-VN' END AND A.created between TO_DATE (#{startDate}, 'yyyy/mm/dd') AND TO_DATE (#{endDate}, 'yyyy/mm/dd') + 1 AND A.reporttype = #{nType} ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN (( #{page} - 1 ) * 20 + 1) AND (( #{page} ) * 20 )

SELECT COUNT(*) as CNT FROM DATA_FUNDS A WHERE SUBSTR (A.PATH,1,5) = CASE #{lang} WHEN 'vi_VN' THEN 'vi-VN' WHEN 'en_US' THEN 'en-US' WHEN 'kr_KR' THEN 'kr-KR' ELSE 'vi-VN' END AND A.created between TO_DATE (#{startDate}, 'yyyy/mm/dd') AND TO_DATE (#{endDate}, 'yyyy/mm/dd') + 1 AND A.reporttype = #{nType}
SELECT id, data, title, created, name FROM DATA_FUNDS WHERE ID = UPPER(#{sid})
